get_common_copy_button_content ( $  CommonStateConfig  ) 

Function returns code of the copy button.

Parameters:
$CommonStateConfig - State's config.
Returns:
HTML code to display.
Exceptions:
Exception - An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 278 of file common_buttons.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $ValidatingPermits = $CommonStateConfig->get_setting( 
                              'permits_validation' , $CommonStateConfig->get_setting( 'permits_filter' , 'admin' )
                        );
                        
                        $PermitValidationResult = $this->PermitAlgorithms->object_has_all_permits( 
                              false , 'user' , $ValidatingPermits 
                        );
                        
                        if( $PermitValidationResult )
                        {
                              $ButtonCode  = '{href:id={prefix}_copy_button;class=common_button_layout;';
                              $ButtonCode .= 'tpl={if:condition={get_var:name={prefix}_form_records_count;default=1};';
                              $ButtonCode .= 'then=submit2mass;else=no_href};form_id={prefix}_form;';
                              $ButtonCode .= 'param1={prefix}_context_action;value1=copy_record_form;';
                              $ButtonCode .= 'param2={prefix}_record_id;value2=-1;text=copy;';
                              $ButtonCode .= 'no_select_msg=no_selected_{prefix};name={prefix}}';
                              
                              return( $ButtonCode );
                        }
                              
                        return( '' );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

Definition at line 120 of file common_buttons.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $ValidatingPermits = $CommonStateConfig->get_setting( 
                              'permits_validation' , $CommonStateConfig->get_setting( 'permits_filter' , 'admin' )
                        );
                        
                        $PermitValidationResult = $this->PermitAlgorithms->object_has_all_permits( 
                              false , 'user' , $ValidatingPermits 
                        );

                        if( $PermitValidationResult )
                        {
                              $Path = _get_package_relative_path_ex( 'gui::context_set::common_buttons' , 'last' );
                              
                              $ButtonCode = "{toolbar_button:page=javascript:ultimix.forms.SubmitForm1( '{prefix}_form' , ".
                                                  "'{prefix}_context_action' , 'create_record_form' , false , false , false , 'post' ".
                                                  ");package_name=gui::context_set::common_buttons;icon=create.gif;permit=public;".
                                                  "title=create_button}";
                              
                              return( $ButtonCode );
                        }

                        return( '' );
                  }

get_common_delete_button_content ( $  CommonStateConfig,
$  ExtOptions 
)

Function returns code of the delete button.

Parameters:
$CommonStateConfig - State's config.
$ExtOptions - Additional drawing options.
Returns:
HTML code to display.
Exceptions:
Exception - An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 336 of file common_buttons.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $PermitsFilter = $CommonStateConfig->get_setting( 'permits_filter' , 'admin' );
                        $ValidatingPermits = $CommonStateConfig->get_setting( 'permits_validation' , $PermitsFilter );
                        $PermitValidationResult = $this->PermitAlgorithms->object_has_all_permits( 
                              false , 'user' , $ValidatingPermits 
                        );
                        
                        if( $PermitValidationResult )
                        {
                              if( $this->Version <= 1 )
                              {
                                    $Name = $ExtOptions->get_setting( 'name' , '{prefix}' );
                                    $ButtonCode  = '{href:class=common_button_layout;';
                                    $ButtonCode .= 'tpl={if:condition={get_var:name={prefix}_form_records_count;default=1};';
                                    $ButtonCode .= 'then=submit2mass;else=no_href};form_id={prefix}_form;';
                                    $ButtonCode .= 'param1={prefix}_action;value1=delete_record;param2={prefix}_record_id;';
                                    $ButtonCode .= 'value2=-1;confirm_string=shure_to_delete_all_{prefix};';
                                    $ButtonCode .= 'raw_text={lang:delete_{prefix};default=delete};';
                                    $ButtonCode .= "no_select_msg=no_selected_{prefix};name=$Name}";
                              }
                              elseif( $this->Version >= 2 )
                              {
                                    $ButtonCode  = '<a class="common_button_layout" ';
                                    $ButtonCode .= 'style="display: {if:condition={get_var:name={prefix}_form_records_count;default=1};';
                                    $ButtonCode .= 'then=inline;else=none}" href="javascript:ultimix.{prefix}.Delete( ';
                                    $ButtonCode .= '\'#{prefix}_form\' , \'./[page_name].html\' , \'no_selected_{prefix}\' , ';
                                    $ButtonCode .= '\'shure_to_delete_all_selected_records\' , true );">{lang:delete_{prefix};';
                                    $ButtonCode .= 'default=delete}</a>';
                              }

                              return( $ButtonCode );
                        }
                        
                        return( '' );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

process_cancel ( &$  Options,
$  Str,
$  Changed 
)

Function processes macro 'cancel'.

Parameters:
$Options - Options of drawing.
$Str - String to process.
$Changed - true if any of the page's elements was compiled.
Returns:
array( Processed string , Was the string changed ).
Exceptions:
Exception - An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 569 of file common_buttons.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( strpos( $Str , '{cancel}' ) !== false )
                        {
                              $Str = str_replace( '{cancel}' , '{cancel:p=1}' , $Str );
                        }
                        
                        for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'cancel' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->Settings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );

                              $Page = $Options->get_setting( 
                                    'cancel_page' , $this->Settings->get_setting( 'page' , $_SERVER[ 'REQUEST_URI' ] )
                              );
                              
                              $Page = str_replace( '=' , '[eq]' , $Page );
                              $Page = str_replace( ';' , '[dot_comma]' , $Page );
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{cancel:$MacroParameters}" , "{href:tpl=std;page=$Page;text=cancel}" , $Str );
                              
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

process_copy_button_creation ( $  Settings,
$  Options,
$  ControlCode 
)

Function processes macro 'copy_button' in a string.

Parameters:
$Settings - Set of contexts settings.
$Options - Options of drawing.
$ControlCode - processing string.
Returns:
HTML code to display.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 859 of file common_buttons.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $CommonButtonConfig = $this->ContextSetUtilities->load_common_state_config( 
                              $Settings , 
                              'common_state_config_copy_form' , 
                              'cfcxs_copy_form' , 
                              $Options->get_setting( 'file_path' )
                        );
                        
                        if( strpos( $ControlCode , '{copy_button}' ) !== false )
                        {
                              $ControlCode = str_replace( '{copy_button}' , '{copy_button:p=1}' , $ControlCode );
                        }
                        
                        for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $ControlCode , 'copy_button' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->MacroSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
                              $ButtonCode = $this->get_common_copy_button_content( $CommonButtonConfig );
                              $ControlCode = str_replace( "{copy_button:$MacroParameters}" , $ButtonCode , $ControlCode );
                        }
                        
                        return( $ControlCode );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

Definition at line 410 of file common_buttons.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( strpos( $Str , '{create}' ) !== false )
                        {
                              $Str = str_replace( '{create}' , '{create:text=create}' ,$Str );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }

                        for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'create' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->Settings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
                              $Text = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'text' );
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( 
                                    "{create:$MacroParameters}" , "{href:tpl=submit0;form_id={prefix}_create_form;text=$Text}" , 
                                    $Str 
                              );
                              
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )

                  {

                              $Settings , 
                              'common_state_config_create_form' , 
                              'cfcxs_create_form' , 
                              $Options->get_setting( 'file_path' )
                        );

            {
                  try
                  {
                        list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_create( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
                        
                        list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_save( $Options , $Str , $Changed );
                        
                        list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_copy( $Options , $Str , $Changed );

                        list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_cancel( $Options , $Str , $Changed );

                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
